description: a(n) = tau(binomial(2*n,n)), where tau = number of divisors (A000005).
links: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: f[n_] := DivisorSigma[0, Binomial[2 n, n]]; Table[f@n, {n, 0, 42}] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Apr 08 2009 *)
author: _David Johnson-Davies_
